result.reason: The issue describes a specific, user-requested integration gap for common shell launchers (cmd, mintty, Git Bash, WSL) that is not fully covered by current behavior.
result.approach: Add launcher-aware integration handling and child-process window detection for these tools, then validate with integration tests and document recommended configurations.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"The issue describes a specific, user-requested integration gap for common shell launchers (cmd, mintty, Git Bash, WSL) that is not fully covered by current behavior.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/IntegratedProgram.cs","mRemoteNGTests/Connection/Protocol/IntegratedProgramTests.cs","mRemoteNGDocumentation/external_tools_cheat_sheet.rst"],"approach":"Add launcher-aware integration handling and child-process window detection for these tools, then validate with integration tests and document recommended configurations."}
